elements.name: question1
elements.title: Which selection criteria can influence the purchasing decision in your current work situation? Name three criteria and give reasons for them.
elements.correctAnswer: Individual solution. Depending on the intended use, print volume, print output quality: letter, sketches (affects resolution and color), cost per copy (purchase, service, paper quality, etc.)

elements.name: question2
elements.title: To what extent is the page per minute figure only of limited significance? Explain what this is about.
elements.correctAnswer: Page per minute indicates how many pages a printer can print per minute. Page per minute is a very imprecise figure as it says little: text takes much less time than an image on an A4 page. It should therefore be treated with caution.

elements.name: question7
elements.title: What is meant by resolution in connection with printers?
elements.correctAnswer: Number of color dots that a printer can print per inch (2.54cm). The higher the number, the more image information can be printed.

elements.name: question8
elements.title: What does the price of a printed A4 page consist of?
elements.correctAnswer: Paper price, printing costs (toner/ink price, copier price/rent, electricity, service), labor (wages)
